member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.IsBearerChallenge(System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether an authentication header is a Bearer challenge
member.remarks: This method is forgiving: if the parameter is null, or the scheme in the header is missing, then it will simply return false.
member.returns: True if the header is a Bearer challenge

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.#ctor(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Parses an HTTP WWW-Authentication Bearer challenge from a server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.TryGetValue(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns the value stored at the specified key.
member.remarks: If the key does not exist, will return false and the content of value will not be changed
member.param: The value for the specified key
member.returns: True when the key is found, false when it is not

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.AuthorizationServer
member.summary: Returns the URI for the Authorization server if present, otherwise string.Empty

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.Resource
member.summary: Returns the Realm value if present, otherwise the Authority of the request URI given in the ctor

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.HttpBearerChallenge.Scope
member.summary: Returns the Scope value if present, otherwise string.Empty
